headline: HII is Awarded Contract Modification for Construction of Two Additional Block V Virginia-class Submarines
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., April 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) announced today that the Virginia-class shipbuilding team, which includes the company’s Newport News Shipbuilding (NNS) division, has been awarded a contract modification in support of construction of two fiscal year 2024 Block V submarines. The contract modification, to NNS and teaming partner General Dynamics Electric Boat, authorizes construction of the 11th and 12th fast-attack submarines of the Block V contract. “We appre

headline: HII Launching New “Build It: In America, For America” Ads Celebrating U.S.-based Manufacturing Work and Workforce
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., April 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII), America’s largest military shipbuilder, is launching a series of 15-second television advertisements as part of its nationwide “Build It” campaign. The video advertisements, along with the broader “Build It” campaign, celebrate the crucial manufacturing work performed in the U.S. to build and deliver platforms and technologies in support of the national defense. These include American-built U.S. Navy ships and submarines, as

headline: Will Poor Margin Performance Impact HII's Q1 Earnings?
summary: Huntington Ingalls' Q1 results are likely to be impacted by lower operating margins expected from the majority of its business segments.

raw.headline: Will Poor Margin Performance Impact HII's Q1 Earnings?

headline: HII Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., April 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.35 per share, payable on June 13, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on May 30, 2025. About HII HII is a global, all-domain defense provider. headline: Huntington Ingalls (HII) Q1 Earnings Report Preview: What To Look For
summary: Aerospace and defense company Huntington Ingalls (NYSE:HII) will be announcing earnings results tomorrow before market open. Here’s what to look for.
